thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core
Class Frustum

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Frustum

public class Frustum
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements three-dimensional region which is visible on the screen. It is the field of view of the notional camera which is implemented as frustum of a rectangular pyramid with 6 planes.

Author:
thothbot
